actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: To require the registration of all persons providing intercountry adoption services.
short_title: Intercountry Adoption Services Provider Registration Act

summary.text: Intercountry Adoption Services Provider Registration Act - Sets forth specified registration filing requirements of any person offering intercountry adoption services, including annual supplementary updates and filing fees, criminal penalties for noncompliance, and public availability of all related documents.

titles.title: Intercountry Adoption Services Provider Registration Act
To require the registration of all persons providing intercountry adoption services.
